Navigation.title: Virtual Counselor - Mental Wellness AI Tool Navigator

Footer.title: Virtual Counselor - Mental Wellness AI Tool Navigator
Footer.subTitle: Discover the best mental wellness AI tools with Virtual Counselor!

1.question: What is the Virtual Counselor Mental Wellness Tool Platform?
1.answer: Virtual Counselor Mental Wellness Tool Platform is building an AI tool directory to help you find your favorite AI tools. You can find tools for emotional regulation, cognitive recovery, relationship growth, etc. here.

2.question: How to find your AI tools in the Virtual Counselor Mental Wellness Tool Platform?
2.answer-2: 2. Browse the AI tools in the Virtual Counselor Mental Wellness Tool Platform.
2.answer-3: 3. Click the AI tool you need to view details and visit it.

3.question: What are the main features of the Virtual Counselor Mental Wellness Tool Platform?
3.answer-1: 1. Free AI Tool Directory: It's free to find your favorite AI tools here.
3.answer-2: 2. Startup List: A free list for AI tool developers focused on wellness startups.

4.question: Is it free to submit AI tools to the Virtual Counselor Mental Wellness Tool Platform?
4.answer: Yes, it's currently free. But you should share a backlink for the Virtual Counselor Mental Wellness Tool Platform!

5.question: What categories of AI Tools does the Virtual Counselor Mental Wellness Tool Platform support?
5.answer: We will support all kinds of mental wellness AI tools later. Please wait for updates.

6.question: How often are AI tools updated in the Virtual Counselor Mental Wellness Tool Platform?
6.answer: The list of AI tools will be updated daily.

7.question: Is GPT-4o or Sora AI supported here?
7.answer: You can find information about GPT-4o or Sora AI tools here, including introductions and links to their websites.

8.question: Troubleshooting
8.answer: If content isn't appearing, try a different browser or clear your cache. If issues persist, contact us at contact@virtualcounselor.life.

9.question: How is the content of the Virtual Counselor Mental Wellness Tool Platform generated?
9.answer: The descriptions of the AI tools are generated by GPT-4o from OpenAI.

10.question: What are the usage rights for the AI tools listed?
10.answer: Virtual Counselor is just a directory for AI tools. The usage rights depend on the individual AI tool's website.

11.question: Is the web UI of the Virtual Counselor Mental Wellness Tool Platform open source?
11.answer: Yes, we will open source the web UI of the Virtual Counselor Mental Wellness Tool Platform on GitHub. Please star us.

privacyPolicy.1-h1: Privacy Policy for Virtual Counselor Mental Wellness AI Tool Navigator
privacyPolicy.1-p: This page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service. If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy. The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions.
privacyPolicy.2-p: For a better experience, while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information. The information that we request will be retained on your device and is not collected by us in any way. The app does use third-party services that may collect information used to identify you.
privacyPolicy.3-p: We want to inform you that whenever you use our Service, in case of an error in the app we collect data and information (through third-party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol ('IP') address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing our Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.
privacyPolicy.4-p: Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device's internal memory. This Service does not use these "cookies" explicitly. However, the app may use third-party code and libraries that use "cookies" to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.
privacyPolicy.5-p-1: We may employ third-party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:
privacyPolicy.5-li-2: To provide the Service on our behalf;
privacyPolicy.5-li-4: To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used;
privacyPolicy.5-p-2: We want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to your Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.
privacyPolicy.6-p: We value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacyPolicy.7-p: This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by us. Therefore, we strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
privacyPolicy.8-p: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

termsConditions.1-h1: Terms of Service for Virtual Counselor Mental Wellness AI Tool Navigator
termsConditions.1-p: Welcome to Virtual Counselor! Our website, located at https://virtualcounselor.life ("Website"), is dedicated to providing you with access to mental wellness AI tools. By accessing or using our Website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree with any part of the terms, then you are prohibited from using the Website.
termsConditions.2-p: You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the Website and its services for personal, non-commercial purposes. This license does not include any rights to copy, modify, or distribute the Website's content or use it for commercial purposes without our prior written consent.
termsConditions.3-p: Virtual Counselor is a directory and does not claim ownership over the tools listed. Ownership and usage rights belong to the respective tool creators as per their terms.
termsConditions.4-p: We collect personal data (name, email) if submitted via contact forms and non-personal data (web cookies) to improve our services. The use of this data is governed by our Privacy Policy.
termsConditions.5-p: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States of America, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
termsConditions.6-p: Virtual Counselor reserves the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will endeavor to notify users of significant changes. Your continued use of the Website after any change in these Terms will constitute your acceptance of such changes.
termsConditions.7-p: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at contact@virtualcounselor.life.
termsConditions.last-p: By using Virtual Counselor, you signify your acceptance of these Terms of Service.
